author: Ruobing Su, Holly Secon and Andy Kiersz
title: An animated map shows how the coronavirus spread through the US, state by state, since the first confirmed case in January
description: The US has recorded over 486,000 coronavirus cases. More than 18,000 people have died. An animated map shows the outbreak's progression across the country since the first case was confirmed in January. Visit Business Insider's homepage for more stories. On Ja…
content:
On January 20, the US reported the first coronavirus case on American soil — a traveler who'd returned from Wuhan, China, in Washington state. 
In the two-and-a-half months since, cases in the country have surged. More than 486,000 people have gotten sick — … [+1554 chars]
